00043 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00044 
00045 char *cfs_strrstr(const char *haystack, const char *needle)
00046 {
00047         char *ptr;
00048 
00049         if (unlikely(haystack == NULL || needle == NULL))
00050                 return NULL;
00051 
00052         if (strlen(needle) == 1)
00053                 return strrchr(haystack, needle[0]);
00054 
00055         ptr = strstr(haystack, needle);
00056         if (ptr != NULL) {
00057                 while (1) {
00058                         char *tmp;
00059 
00060                         tmp = strstr(&ptr[1], needle);
00061                         if (tmp == NULL)
00062                                 return ptr;
00063 
00064                         ptr = tmp;
00065                 }
00066         }
00067 
00068         return NULL;
00069 }
00070 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_strrstr);
00071 
00072 /* Convert a text string to a bitmask */
00073 int cfs_str2mask(const char *str, const char *(*bit2str)(int bit),
00074                  int *oldmask, int minmask, int allmask)
00075 {
00076         const char *debugstr;
00077         char op = 0;
00078         int newmask = minmask, i, len, found = 0;
00079         ENTRY;
00080 
00081         /* <str> must be a list of tokens separated by whitespace
00082          * and optionally an operator ('+' or '-').  If an operator
00083          * appears first in <str>, '*oldmask' is used as the starting point
00084          * (relative), otherwise minmask is used (absolute).  An operator
00085          * applies to all following tokens up to the next operator. */
00086         while (*str != 0) {
00087                 while (isspace(*str))
00088                         str++;
00089                 if (*str == 0)
00090                         break;
00091                 if (*str == '+' || *str == '-') {
00092                         op = *str++;
00093                         if (!found)
00094                                 /* only if first token is relative */
00095                                 newmask = *oldmask;
00096                         while (isspace(*str))
00097                                 str++;
00098                         if (*str == 0)          /* trailing op */
00099                                 return -EINVAL;
00100                 }
00101 
00102                 /* find token length */
00103                 for (len = 0; str[len] != 0 && !isspace(str[len]) &&
00104                       str[len] != '+' && str[len] != '-'; len++);
00105 
00106                 /* match token */
00107                 found = 0;
00108                 for (i = 0; i < 32; i++) {
00109                         debugstr = bit2str(i);
00110                         if (debugstr != NULL &&
00111                             strlen(debugstr) == len &&
00112                             strncasecmp(str, debugstr, len) == 0) {
00113                                 if (op == '-')
00114                                         newmask &= ~(1 << i);
00115                                 else
00116                                         newmask |= (1 << i);
00117                                 found = 1;
00118                                 break;
00119                         }
00120                 }
00121                 if (!found && len == 3 &&
00122                     (strncasecmp(str, "ALL", len) == 0)) {
00123                         if (op == '-')
00124                                 newmask = minmask;
00125                         else
00126                                 newmask = allmask;
00127                         found = 1;
00128                 }
00129                 if (!found) {
00130                         CWARN("unknown mask '%.*s'.\n"
00131                               "mask usage: [+|-]<all|type> ...\n", len, str);
00132                         return -EINVAL;
00133                 }
00134                 str += len;
00135         }
00136 
00137         *oldmask = newmask;
00138         return 0;
00139 }
00140 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_str2mask);
00141 
00142 /* get the first string out of @str */
00143 char *cfs_firststr(char *str, size_t size)
00144 {
00145         size_t i = 0;
00146         char  *end;
00147 
00148         /* trim leading spaces */
00149         while (i < size && *str && isspace(*str)) {
00150                 ++i;
00151                 ++str;
00152         }
00153 
00154         /* string with all spaces */
00155         if (*str == '\0')
00156                 goto out;
00157 
00158         end = str;
00159         while (i < size && *end != '\0' && !isspace(*end)) {
00160                 ++i;
00161                 ++end;
00162         }
00163 
00164         *end= '\0';
00165 out:
00166         return str;
00167 }
00168 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_firststr);
00169 
00170 char *
00171 cfs_trimwhite(char *str)
00172 {
00173         char *end;
00174 
00175         while (isspace(*str))
00176                 str++;
00177 
00178         end = str + strlen(str);
00179         while (end > str) {
00180                 if (!isspace(end[-1]))
00181                         break;
00182                 end--;
00183         }
00184 
00185         *end = 0;
00186         return str;
00187 }
00188 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_trimwhite);
00189 
00200 int
00201 cfs_gettok(struct cfs_lstr *next, char delim, struct cfs_lstr *res)
00202 {
00203         char *end;
00204 
00205         if (next->ls_str == NULL)
00206                 return 0;
00207 
00208         /* skip leading white spaces */
00209         while (next->ls_len) {
00210                 if (!isspace(*next->ls_str))
00211                         break;
00212                 next->ls_str++;
00213                 next->ls_len--;
00214         }
00215 
00216         if (next->ls_len == 0) /* whitespaces only */
00217                 return 0;
00218 
00219         if (*next->ls_str == delim) {
00220                 /* first non-writespace is the delimiter */
00221                 return 0;
00222         }
00223 
00224         res->ls_str = next->ls_str;
00225         end = memchr(next->ls_str, delim, next->ls_len);
00226         if (end == NULL) {
00227                 /* there is no the delimeter in the string */
00228                 end = next->ls_str + next->ls_len;
00229                 next->ls_str = NULL;
00230         } else {
00231                 next->ls_str = end + 1;
00232                 next->ls_len -= (end - res->ls_str + 1);
00233         }
00234 
00235         /* skip ending whitespaces */
00236         while (--end != res->ls_str) {
00237                 if (!isspace(*end))
00238                         break;
00239         }
00240 
00241         res->ls_len = end - res->ls_str + 1;
00242         return 1;
00243 }
00244 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_gettok);
00245 
00255 int
00256 cfs_str2num_check(char *str, int nob, unsigned *num,
00257                   unsigned min, unsigned max)
00258 {
00259         char    *endp;
00260 
00261         *num = simple_strtoul(str, &endp, 0);
00262         if (endp == str)
00263                 return 0;
00264 
00265         for (; endp < str + nob; endp++) {
00266                 if (!isspace(*endp))
00267                         return 0;
00268         }
00269 
00270         return (*num >= min && *num <= max);
00271 }
00272 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_str2num_check);
00273 
00287 static int
00288 cfs_range_expr_parse(struct cfs_lstr *src, unsigned min, unsigned max,
00289                      int bracketed, struct cfs_range_expr **expr)
00290 {
00291         struct cfs_range_expr   *re;
00292         struct cfs_lstr         tok;
00293 
00294         LIBCFS_ALLOC(re, sizeof(*re));
00295         if (re == NULL)
00296                 return -ENOMEM;
00297 
00298         if (src->ls_len == 1 && src->ls_str[0] == '*') {
00299                 re->re_lo = min;
00300                 re->re_hi = max;
00301                 re->re_stride = 1;
00302                 goto out;
00303         }
00304 
00305         if (cfs_str2num_check(src->ls_str, src->ls_len,
00306                               &re->re_lo, min, max)) {
00307                 /* <number> is parsed */
00308                 re->re_hi = re->re_lo;
00309                 re->re_stride = 1;
00310                 goto out;
00311         }
00312 
00313         if (!bracketed || !cfs_gettok(src, '-', &tok))
00314                 goto failed;
00315 
00316         if (!cfs_str2num_check(tok.ls_str, tok.ls_len,
00317                                &re->re_lo, min, max))
00318                 goto failed;
00319 
00320         /* <number> - */
00321         if (cfs_str2num_check(src->ls_str, src->ls_len,
00322                               &re->re_hi, min, max)) {
00323                 /* <number> - <number> is parsed */
00324                 re->re_stride = 1;
00325                 goto out;
00326         }
00327 
00328         /* go to check <number> '-' <number> '/' <number> */
00329         if (cfs_gettok(src, '/', &tok)) {
00330                 if (!cfs_str2num_check(tok.ls_str, tok.ls_len,
00331                                        &re->re_hi, min, max))
00332                         goto failed;
00333 
00334                 /* <number> - <number> / ... */
00335                 if (cfs_str2num_check(src->ls_str, src->ls_len,
00336                                       &re->re_stride, min, max)) {
00337                         /* <number> - <number> / <number> is parsed */
00338                         goto out;
00339                 }
00340         }
00341 
00342  out:
00343         *expr = re;
00344         return 0;
00345 
00346  failed:
00347         LIBCFS_FREE(re, sizeof(*re));
00348         return -EINVAL;
00349 }
00350 
00358 static int
00359 cfs_range_expr_print(char *buffer, int count, struct cfs_range_expr *expr,
00360                      bool bracketed)
00361 {
00362         int i;
00363         char s[] = "[";
00364         char e[] = "]";
00365 
00366         if (bracketed)
00367                 s[0] = e[0] = '\0';
00368 
00369         if (expr->re_lo == expr->re_hi)
00370                 i = scnprintf(buffer, count, "%u", expr->re_lo);
00371         else if (expr->re_stride == 1)
00372                 i = scnprintf(buffer, count, "%s%u-%u%s",
00373                                   s, expr->re_lo, expr->re_hi, e);
00374         else
00375                 i = scnprintf(buffer, count, "%s%u-%u/%u%s",
00376                                   s, expr->re_lo, expr->re_hi,
00377                                   expr->re_stride, e);
00378         return i;
00379 }
00380 
00388 int
00389 cfs_expr_list_print(char *buffer, int count, struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list)
00390 {
00391         struct cfs_range_expr *expr;
00392         int i = 0, j = 0;
00393         int numexprs = 0;
00394 
00395         if (count <= 0)
00396                 return 0;
00397 
00398         list_for_each_entry(expr, &expr_list->el_exprs, re_link)
00399                 numexprs++;
00400 
00401         if (numexprs > 1)
00402                 i += scnprintf(buffer + i, count - i, "[");
00403 
00404         list_for_each_entry(expr, &expr_list->el_exprs, re_link) {
00405                 if (j++ != 0)
00406                         i += scnprintf(buffer + i, count - i, ",");
00407                 i += cfs_range_expr_print(buffer + i, count - i, expr,
00408                                           numexprs > 1);
00409         }
00410 
00411         if (numexprs > 1)
00412                 i += scnprintf(buffer + i, count - i, "]");
00413 
00414         return i;
00415 }
00416 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_expr_list_print);
00417 
00424 int
00425 cfs_expr_list_match(__u32 value, struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list)
00426 {
00427         struct cfs_range_expr   *expr;
00428 
00429         list_for_each_entry(expr, &expr_list->el_exprs, re_link) {
00430                 if (value >= expr->re_lo && value <= expr->re_hi &&
00431                     ((value - expr->re_lo) % expr->re_stride) == 0)
00432                         return 1;
00433         }
00434 
00435         return 0;
00436 }
00437 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_expr_list_match);
00438 
00446 int
00447 cfs_expr_list_values(struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list, int max, __u32 **valpp)
00448 {
00449         struct cfs_range_expr   *expr;
00450         __u32                   *val;
00451         int                     count = 0;
00452         int                     i;
00453 
00454         list_for_each_entry(expr, &expr_list->el_exprs, re_link) {
00455                 for (i = expr->re_lo; i <= expr->re_hi; i++) {
00456                         if (((i - expr->re_lo) % expr->re_stride) == 0)
00457                                 count++;
00458                 }
00459         }
00460 
00461         if (count == 0) /* empty expression list */
00462                 return 0;
00463 
00464         if (count > max) {
00465                 CERROR("Number of values %d exceeds max allowed %d\n",
00466                        max, count);
00467                 return -EINVAL;
00468         }
00469 
00470         LIBCFS_ALLOC(val, sizeof(val[0]) * count);
00471         if (val == NULL)
00472                 return -ENOMEM;
00473 
00474         count = 0;
00475         list_for_each_entry(expr, &expr_list->el_exprs, re_link) {
00476                 for (i = expr->re_lo; i <= expr->re_hi; i++) {
00477                         if (((i - expr->re_lo) % expr->re_stride) == 0)
00478                                 val[count++] = i;
00479                 }
00480         }
00481 
00482         *valpp = val;
00483         return count;
00484 }
00485 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_expr_list_values);
00486 
00492 void
00493 cfs_expr_list_free(struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list)
00494 {
00495         while (!list_empty(&expr_list->el_exprs)) {
00496                 struct cfs_range_expr *expr;
00497 
00498                 expr = list_entry(expr_list->el_exprs.next,
00499                                       struct cfs_range_expr, re_link);
00500                 list_del(&expr->re_link);
00501                 LIBCFS_FREE(expr, sizeof(*expr));
00502         }
00503 
00504         LIBCFS_FREE(expr_list, sizeof(*expr_list));
00505 }
00506 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_expr_list_free);
00507 
00514 int
00515 cfs_expr_list_parse(char *str, int len, unsigned min, unsigned max,
00516                     struct cfs_expr_list **elpp)
00517 {
00518         struct cfs_expr_list    *expr_list;
00519         struct cfs_range_expr   *expr;
00520         struct cfs_lstr         src;
00521         int                     rc;
00522 
00523         LIBCFS_ALLOC(expr_list, sizeof(*expr_list));
00524         if (expr_list == NULL)
00525                 return -ENOMEM;
00526 
00527         src.ls_str = str;
00528         src.ls_len = len;
00529 
00530         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&expr_list->el_exprs);
00531 
00532         if (src.ls_str[0] == '[' &&
00533             src.ls_str[src.ls_len - 1] == ']') {
00534                 src.ls_str++;
00535                 src.ls_len -= 2;
00536 
00537                 rc = -EINVAL;
00538                 while (src.ls_str != NULL) {
00539                         struct cfs_lstr tok;
00540 
00541                         if (!cfs_gettok(&src, ',', &tok)) {
00542                                 rc = -EINVAL;
00543                                 break;
00544                         }
00545 
00546                         rc = cfs_range_expr_parse(&tok, min, max, 1, &expr);
00547                         if (rc != 0)
00548                                 break;
00549 
00550                         list_add_tail(&expr->re_link,
00551                                           &expr_list->el_exprs);
00552                 }
00553         } else {
00554                 rc = cfs_range_expr_parse(&src, min, max, 0, &expr);
00555                 if (rc == 0) {
00556                         list_add_tail(&expr->re_link,
00557                                           &expr_list->el_exprs);
00558                 }
00559         }
00560 
00561         if (rc != 0)
00562                 cfs_expr_list_free(expr_list);
00563         else
00564                 *elpp = expr_list;
00565 
00566         return rc;
00567 }
00568 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_expr_list_parse);
00569 
00578 void
00579 cfs_expr_list_free_list(struct list_head *list)
00580 {
00581         struct cfs_expr_list *el;
00582 
00583         while (!list_empty(list)) {
00584                 el = list_entry(list->next,
00585                                     struct cfs_expr_list, el_link);
00586                 list_del(&el->el_link);
00587                 cfs_expr_list_free(el);
00588         }
00589 }
00590 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_expr_list_free_list);
